1{-# OPTIONS_GHC -Wall #-}
2
3-- | File path and content in lazy bytestring.
4
5module Koshucode.Baala.Base.IO.BzFile
6  ( BzFile (..),
7    readBzFile,
8    tryReadFile,
9  ) where
10
11import qualified Control.Exception             as E
12import qualified Data.ByteString.Lazy          as Bz
13import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Base.Abort    as B
14import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Base.Prelude  as B
15
16-- | File path and content in lazy bytestring.
17--   The function 'readBzFile' creates:
18--
19--   * 'BzFile' with content and 'Nothing'-exception on success,
20--   * 'BzFile' with empty content and 'Just'-exception on failure.
21--
22data BzFile = BzFile
23    { bzFilePath       :: FilePath               -- ^ Path of file.
24    , bzFileContent    :: B.Ab B.Bz              -- ^ File content as lazy bytestring.
25    , bzFileException  :: Maybe E.SomeException  -- ^ Exception when reading file.
26    } deriving (Show)
27
28bzFileOf :: FilePath -> BzFile
29bzFileOf path = BzFile { bzFilePath      = path
30                       , bzFileContent   = Left notInit
31                       , bzFileException = Nothing }
32
33-- | Read file from given path.
34readBzFile :: FilePath -> IO BzFile
35readBzFile path =
36    do content <- tryReadFile path
37       let file = bzFileOf path
38       return $ case content of
39                  Right bz -> file { bzFileContent = Right bz }
40                  Left e   -> file { bzFileContent = Left $ cannotReadFile e
41                                   , bzFileException = Just e }
42
43-- | Read file content as lazy bytestring.
44tryReadFile :: (E.Exception e) => FilePath -> IO (Either e B.Bz)
45tryReadFile = E.try . Bz.readFile
46
47notInit :: B.AbortReason
48notInit = B.abortBecause "Not initialized"
49
50cannotReadFile :: (Show a) => a -> B.AbortReason
51cannotReadFile e = B.abortLine "Cannot read file" $ show e
